<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ratspeak](/Feats.aspx?ID=1299) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

To you, the squeaking of rats and other rodents makes a strange kind of sense. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with rodents, including beavers, mice, porcupines, rats, and squirrels, but not with other mammals, such as dogs or bats. The GM determines which animals count as rodents.
name: Ratspeak
